metadata.title: RZ/V: AI Partner: Is support possible for an application other than those listed?

sections.content:
Question:
Can I request an application other than those listed?
Answer:
Assistance from consultation to verification and commercialization can be provided to help customers achieve their goal. 
Please directly contact a partner.
